oai_dc:dc.dc:title: ROUND ABOUT MACHINE LEARNING
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Coco, Giovanni
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: In this talk I will review the use of Machine Learning in studies of coastal morphodynamics. I will discuss a number of problems where ML tools have been used and why it makes sense to use ML methods. I will also outline recent advances in ML algorithms and applications, and discuss possible areas for future research.Recorded Presentation from the vICCE (YouTube Link): https://youtu.be/X5QnAdD1-T8
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Coastal Engineering Proceedings; No. 36v (2020): Proceedings of virtual Conference on Coastal Engineering, 2020; keynote.4
